verbs.description: i [V: can] not do it alone says atiku i can not do it alone i need your support i need your assistance i need your understanding and i need your participation it is not a one - man job it is a collective responsibility and i am prepared to listen to you to take your advice to consult with you to work with you and together we will succeed and when we succeed we shall all be partners in that success he said port harcourt rivers state government house of representatives of thailand aminu tambuwal peoples democratic party popular conservative alliance sokoto state sahara reporters house of representatives governor wike apc rivers state atiku abubakar
